clinical_study.brief_title: Dose Escalation Study of Pasireotide (SOM230) in Patients With Advanced Neuroendocrine Tumors (NETs)
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase I, Multi-center, Open-label, Dose Escalation Study of Pasireotide (SOM230) LAR in Patients With Advanced Neuroendocrine Tumors (NETs)

brief_summary.textblock: This study designed to determine the Maximum Tolerated Dose (MTD) for patients with advanced Neuroendocrine Tumors (NETs) and to characterize the safety, tolerability, Pharmacokinetics and preliminary efficacy of pasireotide LAR administered i.m. once every 28 days.

primary_outcome.measure: Determine the MTD/RP2D of pasireotide LAR when administered i.m. q28 days to patients with advanced NETs
primary_outcome.time_frame: Sequentiona 56 day cohorts until the MTD is determined
primary_outcome.description: Frequency of dose-limiting toxicities (DLTs) at each dose level associated with q28 days administration of pasireotide LAR during the first 2 treatment cycles.

secondary_outcome.measure: assess the safety and tolerability of pasireotide LAR
secondary_outcome.time_frame: minimum of twelve 28 day cycles to approximately eighteen 28 day cycles
secondary_outcome.description: Incidence of adverse drug events, overall and by severity and incidence of serious adverse events and laboratory abnormalities. Also, changes in laboratory assessments, electrocardiograms, Holter monitor, imaging for gallstones, and assessment of physical examinations such as vital signs

secondary_outcome.measure: assess the pharmacokinetics (PK) of pasireotide LAR
secondary_outcome.time_frame: minimum of twelve 28 day cycles to approximately eighteen 28 day cycles

secondary_outcome.measure: assess the pharmacodynamics (PD) of pasireotide LAR
secondary_outcome.time_frame: minimum of twelve 28 day cycles to approximately eighteen 28 day cycles
secondary_outcome.description: Changes from baseline values in IGF-1, chromogranin A and neuron-specific enolase

secondary_outcome.measure: assess the preliminary efficacy (anti-tumor activity) of pasireotide LAR.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: minimum of twelve 28 day cycles to approximately eighteen 28 day cycles
secondary_outcome.description: Disease control rate (CR+PR+SD as assessed by RECIST 1.0). Also measure progression free survival (PFS).

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- ≥18 yrs old, histologically confirmed advanced well or moderately differentiated neuroendocrine tumor/carcinoma
- unresectable metastatic NET tumor with measurable disease
- life expectancy ≥ 12 weeks
Exclusion Criteria:
- Patients with CNS metastases who are neurologically unstable or requiring increasing doses of steroids to control their CNS disease
- patients with known hypersensitivity to somatostatin analogs
- patients with symptomatic cholelithiasis in the past 2 months
- patients with history of another known primary malignancy with exception of non-melanoma skin cancer or carcinoma in situ of uterine cervix
- patients with known history of hepatitis C or chronic active hepatitis B
- patients with diagnosis of HIV.
Other protocol-defined inclusion/exclusion criteria may apply
